thread.title: BRIEF-NBT Bancorp Inc Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.59

title: BRIEF-NBT Bancorp Inc Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.59
text:
April 23, 2018 / 8:27 PM / Updated 10 minutes ago BRIEF-NBT Bancorp Inc Q1 Earnings Per Share $0.59 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
  NBT Bancorp Inc: 
* NBT BANCORP INC ANNOUNCES RECORD FIRST QUARTER NET INCOME OF $26.0 MILLION AND RECORD DILUTED EARNINGS PER SHARE OF $0.59 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.59 
* Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.58 â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S 
* NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $73.5 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018, UP $5.0 MILLION, OR 7.3%, FROM Q1 OF 2017 
* NET INTEREST INCOME WAS $73.5 MILLION FOR Q1 OF 2018, UP $5.0 MILLION, OR 7.3%, FROM Q1 OF 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
